tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to URL manipulation and cache pollution due to inadequate port sanitization in the handling of the `Host` and `X-Forwarded-Host` headers. An attacker can exploit this weakness to manipulate request routing or poison caches, potentially leading to security issues such as cache poisoning attacks or unauthorized access.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a vulnerable version of the package.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@remix-run/express` library to the patch version.
